casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Allen, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Allen, 128 Ohio St.3d 442, 2011-Ohio-1838.]

(No. 2010-1342 Submitted October 12, 2010 Decided April 19, 2011.) Dennis P. Will, Lorain County Prosecuting Attorney, and Billie Jo Belcher, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellant.

{¶ 1} Sua sponte, this cause is no longer held for the decision in 2010-1216, State ex rel. DeWine v. Burge, 128 Ohio St.3d 236, 2011-Ohio-235, 943 N.E.2d 535.

{¶ 2} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed.

O’Connor, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, Cupp, and McGee Brown, JJ., concur.
